kube_list_error: An error has occurred loading your clusters.
kubernetes_add_private_network: Choose a private network for this cluster
kubernetes_add_private_network_descripti: By default, your worker nodes have a public IPv4. If you choose a private network, the public IPs of these nodes will be used exclusively for administration/linking to the Kubernetes control plane, and your nodes will be assigned an IP on the vLAN of the private network you have chosen.
